title: Flat-it
content: [Flat-it type foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224958/http:/flat-it.com/ "Go to the website") is a digital type foundry based in Japan, operating under the direction of [Ryoichi Tsunekawa](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204224958/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ryoichi%20Tsunekawa)
author: DharmaType
